name: ZS - Ouroboros Sage
text: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can activate this effect; you can only declare 1 attack for the rest of this turn, also Special Summon 1 non-LIGHT "Number" monster from your GY, but negate its effects, and if you do, equip both this card and 1 "Utopia" monster you control to the Summoned monster as Equip Spells that each give it 1700 ATK. When the monster equipped with this card by this effect declares an attack on an opponent's monster: You can double the attacking monster's current ATK, but destroy it during the End Phase.
